FuncDef: The display bgp mvpn vpnv6 brief command displays brief information about IPv6 multicast virtual private network (MVPN).
CLIs: display bgp mvpn vpnv6 all brief
display bgp mvpn vpnv6 vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> brief

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Displays information about all IPv6 MVPN.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp mvpn vpnv6 all brief
RD Num               Peer Num             Route Num
VPN-Instance Name    Peer Num             Route Num
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the display bgp mvpn vpnv6 brief command is used to view information about BGP-IPv6 MVPN, VPN instances are listed in the lexicographic order of the VPN instance name.
